name: Wall Clock with Two Birds- small, medium or large
description:
Handmade ceramic wall clock fitted with quiet non-ticking mechanism perfect for any room. Thrown and hand modelled in red earthenware clay and decorated with studio-made glazes and number decals. It is easily mounted on a screw or nail on the wall and an AA battery is included..

Design choices: Small, Medium or Large

Sizes: small 12cm diameter x 5.5cm, medium 14cm diameter x 6.5cm, large 16cm diameter x 7.5cm

These are made to order so please allow 3 weeks for delivery

name: Bike with Basket, Tandem or Bicycle Bowl

Choice of designs: Bike with basket, Tandem or Single Speed Bike

Size: 14cm diameter x 6.5cm height

These bowls are made to order so please allow 3 weeks for delivery

Height of body: approximately 9cm, diameter: 8cm, vol: 280ml

These mugs are made to order so please allow 3 weeks for delivery.

name: Blue Tit Sugar Pot
description:
Each pot is made to order and measures approximately 95mm diameter and 100mm high.  Glaze application and measurements will vary slightly from pot to pot as each one is handmade and unique.  Please allow 3 to 6 weeks for large orders to be made but smaller orders may be available sooner depending on stock levels.

The sugar pots are thrown and the heart on the lid is hand modelled to fit your fingers comfortably.  A hole is drilled into the top for a spoon to sit in. White liquid clay, called slip, is used to decorate and a lead free glaze is applied. The hand drawn decal is fired into the smooth glaze and it can be washed in a dishwasher.  It could be used for sugar, salt, honey, jam or chutney.

Everything is made to order so please allow 3 weeks making time.

name: Ceramic Spoon
description:
The ceramic spoons are hand made in red earthenware clay.  Each one measures approximately 110mm long x 32mm wide x 30mm high.  The patterns are made by rolling soft clay into a mold taken from a vintage cut glass dish and then the spoon is decorated with white slip and foodsafe glaze.  The spoons fit nicely in the sugar pots or can be used in bowls and cups for serving jam, dips or in salt pots.

The spoons are made to order and take 3 to 6 weeks to make. It will be sent Royal Mail First Class (1 - 2 days) for small orders and Parcelforce 48 (2 - 3 days)for larger orders.

name: Floral Patterned Bird Dish
description: This dish measures 84mm diameter by 45mm high.  It was slab built and hand-modelled with red earthenware clay and the patterned base was taken from a vintage cut glass dish.  It has been decorated with a foodsafe glaze and is a handy dish to have in the kitchen for olive pips, tea bags or for serving butter.

name: Ladybird Sugar Pot
description:
Each pot is made to order and measures approximately 95mm diameter and 100mm high.  Glaze application and measurements will vary slightly from pot to pot as each one is handmade and unique.  Please allow 3 to 6 weeks for large orders to be made but smaller orders may be available sooner depending on stock levels.

The sugar pots are thrown and the heart on the lid is hand modelled to fit your fingers comfortably.  A hole is drilled into the top for a spoon to sit in. White liquid clay, called slip, is used to decorate and a lead free glaze is applied. The ladybird decal is fired into the smooth glaze and it can be washed in a dishwasher.  It could be used for sugar, salt, honey, jam or chutney.

name: Bee Sugar Pot
description:

The sugar pots are thrown and the heart on the lid is hand modelled to fit your fingers comfortably.  A hole is drilled into the top for a spoon to sit in. White liquid clay, called slip, is used to decorate and a lead free glaze is applied. The bee decal is fired into the smooth glaze and it can be washed in a dishwasher.  It could be used for sugar, salt, honey, jam or chutney.

Postage and packing costs are free for UK delivery (Parcelforce 48).
